column4: anyone here know of a good free internet TV program for linux where you can watch local TV like fox,CBS,NBC?
you can buy those ATSC and QAM capable tv card so you can watch HDTV..assuming it is broadcasted in your area..then btv i think is the app to use
i dont have cable or an attenna so looking for something where i dont need to connect a cable
those are off the air receivers, it has connector (QAM) for cable digital tv and local stations hdtv
